content:
Hi, I'm struggling with getting this title to render properly: https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/ihe-sdc-ecc-on-fhir/dataextraction.html#dataextraction Screen-Shot-2022-03-14-at-14.53.17.png

Anyone have any ideas on what I'm doing wrong? Here's the .md file: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/HL7/ihe-sdc-ecc-on-fhir/main/input/pagecontent/dataextraction.md

And the whole repo: https://github.com/HL7/ihe-sdc-ecc-on-fhir

First, your top-level headings need to be level 3, not level 2
Second, the issue is your page title. What's the title of your page in your IG?
